app.name: Rentork
app.slogan: You are worth more than you think

login.welcome_description: Rent your Profile, do not let your data be used for Free, Get Paid for it.
login.By_signing_up_you_accept_our: By signing up, you accept our

slide_1.title: Rent Your Profile and Get Paid
slide_1.description_1: While you are on the web or using applications, advertisers use freely your data to display Ads and you get nothing in return.
slide_1.description_2: With this App, your data is no longer used for free, when one of our advertisers wants to show you an ad, he has to pay for your profile and you get your commission.

slide_2.title: Take Control of your Data everywhere
slide_2.description_1: Once the App is setup, no more action is required just enjoy your Favorite Contents.
slide_2.description_2: Websites you visit and Apps you use everyday displaying our Ads make you earn money.
slide_2.description_3: For a better experience, you will only see Ads according to your profile, your interests and your actions to ensure Quality Content.

slide_3.title: Value your Data easily
slide_3.description_1: It's now time to setup your account and get Attractive Income by renting your data.
slide_3.description_2: The amount you can earn depends on your profile value, your actions and your activity.
slide_3.description_3: To start, you need to fill out your profile, your demographics and your interests.

help.welcome_text_1: Do you need some help? Find an answer to your question on the FAQ below.
help.faq_answer_1: Rentork is an Artificial Intelligence App and an Advertising Solution allowing users to earn money by renting their data. Advertisers can create targeted campaigns to reach specific people and will pay depending on the user's profile value and his interests. Each time an advertiser is charged for a view or an action on his ads, the user gets his commission.
help.faq_question_2: 2. What is the minimum age to participate?
help.faq_answer_2: Minimum age to use Rentork is 13 years old. However, if you are under 18, you need to download the Authorization Form and get it signed by your parents.
help.faq_question_3: 3. Do I have to fill out all the fields?
help.faq_answer_3: No, you do not have to fill all the fields, but the more you fill out, the more your profile value increases.
help.faq_question_4: 4. Is my data secured and how?
help.faq_answer_4: Yes, your data is highly secured on the cloud with a SHA256 encryption.
help.faq_question_5: 5. When/Where do I earn money and how much?
help.faq_answer_5: You earn money on the websites you visit and the apps you use everyday when you see Ads from our network or when you take an action. The amount you can earn depends on your profile value, your actions and your activity. If your profile, your demographics and your interests are well detailed you will earn more.
help.faq_question_6: 6. Do I earn money from all the Ads I see?
help.faq_answer_6: No, you only earn money from our Ads everywhere on the websites you visit and the app you use. Our network is growing up very fast and we have new partners everyday joining our solution.
help.faq_question_7: 7. How do I earn money for my actions?
help.faq_answer_7: You can earn money on specific actions like signing up to a service, downloading an app, online purchasing, liking a Facebook Page, video viewing...
help.faq_answer_8: Payout amount is only $5, when you reach this amount, you can fill out your payment details and receive your money.
help.faq_question_9: 9. How do I get paid and when?
help.faq_answer_9: You can receive your money by wire transfer or Paypal. Payments are automatically done every month on the 10th for your available earnings.
help.faq_question_10: 10. Do I have to report what I earned?
help.faq_answer_10: Yes, you do have to report what you earned even if you won't pay any taxes on it depending on your country tax threshold.
